column1: Most of the time, people with these disorders have a family history of a bleeding disorder: - Bernard-Soulier syndrome occurs when platelets lack a substance that sticks to the walls of blood vessels.
- Platelet storage pool disorder (also called platelet secretion disorder) occurs when substances called granules inside platelets aren't stored or released properly.
This disorder causes easy bruising or bleeding.
There is no specific treatment for these disorders.
Most of the time, treatment can control the bleeding.
Complications may include: - Severe bleeding - Iron deficiency anemia in menstruating women
Call your health care provider if: - You have bleeding or bruising and do not know the cause.
